backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law 1042-2020 -- 2490 -2506 Yonge Street

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 1042-2020 to designate 2490 Yonge Street (including entrance addresses 2492-2504 Yonge Street) – 2506 (including entrance addresses 2508-2510 Yonge Street) Yonge Street (Eglinton-Lawrence, Ward 8) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

signedBy: John D. Elvidge, Interim City Clerk
subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 2490 Yonge Street (including entrance addresses 2492-2504 Yonge Street) – 2506 (including entrance addresses 2508-2510 Yonge Street) Yonge Street, City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1042-2020 – 2490-2506 Yonge Street
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
